entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 05:00 AM PST Thursday 09 March 2023

Visibility: 32.2 km

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
